events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. Our team will review your credentials and get back to you shortly with the next steps in the recruitment process.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering roles based on your skills and experience. We are proceeding by matching you with relevant job openings in our software development team.
A recruiter from our engineering hiring team, Sarah Thompson, has been assigned to your application. She will assist you throughout the interview process and answer any queries you might have.
Your initial screening call went well. We discussed your prior coding projects, your familiarity with software development methodologies, and next steps towards scheduling a technical interview.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming availability for the upcoming technical interview. We appreciate your enthusiasm and readiness to move forward in this hiring process.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 22nd, 2024 at 3 PM UTC. The session will include coding challenges and system design questions with our senior software developers.
